column4: I'm having trouble with a live 10.04 CD. CD is OK, but system is unable to mount filesystem.squashfs. Is this the right channel, or can someone provide the name of the right one?
sure ask in here for lucid, did you check the cd for defects once booted to?
did you press space when you saw the stickman screen and select "Check CD for defects"?
does your ram test out ok?
